So I went from 25mg to 50mg and had horrible anxiety and got nauseous randomly as well and I had some lymph node issues as well as facial numbness and eye twitching.. so I went back to 25mg I was told to go to my primary care doctor and basically everyone dismissed my issues so I tried to go to 50 again and same issues happened again..finally had to put my foot down and discontinue the medication because it was turning into Akathisia :( once I quit everything resolved.
